name: subscribe-cov-property-multiple-request
description: Represents a BACnet SubscribeCOVPropertyMultiple request, used to subscribe to change-of-value notifications for multiple properties and objects.

fields.name: subscriber-process-identifier
fields.description: The process identifier of the subscriber.

fields.name: issue-confirmed-notifications
fields.description: Indicates if confirmed notifications should be issued.

fields.name: lifetime
fields.description: The duration of the subscription, in seconds. Optional.

fields.name: max-notification-delay
fields.description: The maximum delay between notifications, in seconds. Optional.

fields.name: list-of-cov-subscription-specifications
monitored-object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object to be monitored.

fields.name: list-of-cov-references
monitored-property
fields.description: The property to be monitored for changes.

fields.name: cov-increment
fields.description: The minimum change in value required to trigger a notification. Optional.

fields.name: timestamped
fields.description: Indicates if the notification should be timestamped.
A list of COV references for the monitored object.
A list of COV subscription specifications for multiple objects and properties.
